info: Primarily engaging with startups in the healthcare, data and AI domains, I try to design <meme-link target="memes" src="dist/images/beautiful@3x.png">beautiful, functional products and systems</meme-link>. I believe in developing long-lasting relationships with my clients to ensure design plays its role as a great <meme-link target="memes" src="dist/images/value@3x.png">value-add</meme-link> to their businesses.
I would love to hear from you over email.
